name: rollypolly
description:
Thanks for playing!

This game was developed for the game jam GMTK2022 with the theme Roll of the Dice

In this game you solve puzzles by rolling a dice.

Controls
  • Select Polly (purple): Alpha 1
    • Polly can push dices and cubes
  • Select Rolly (orange): Alpha 2
    • Rolly can roll dices and cubes
  • Move selected: Arrow keys
